Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

Welcome to The1920sChannel where it's the 1920s all the time! I love making videos about the important people and events that made 1920s America so unique. My main focus is making short documentaries, but I also post other videos of 1920s media like music playlists and cartoons, and anything else related to the '20s that I find interesting. My goal is to make a video encyclopedia of the 1920s as complete as I can, but because I only do this by myself as a hobby, it will take a long time. But it will be a long time before I run out of ideas for videos. So please consider subscribing to my channel if any of this interests you!

Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the_1920s_channel_official/?hl=en

Españolazo, liberaloide, madridista, escribo un blog sobre Fronteras que, inconcebiblemente, tiene lectores. Digo tantos tacos como estupideces.
Cuando joven era viejoven. No me desdigo, me contradigo. Cientificista tricornio. Ingeniero de Caminos. Lector. La familia es lo más importante, no lo único.

Busco titivilus. A veces aparecen cuando escribo. 😉
https://www.miciudadreal.es/category/perfiles/postales-desde-itaca/
¿Estás seguro de que eso es sarro?
INVENTS and Submoronic Picto-thoughts. Connaisseur de #ArteFacha. Ópera bufa.
AHORA TAMBIÉN EN MASTODON
Que no se entere mi madre.
Textutera
La palabra precisa, la tortilla perfecta. Nadie es más que nadie. Übermesetarian 🌾 Anarcopedrette. Enrea. Fusilable. He/him.
